title: BubbleBall with Ben Golliver
itunes:title: BubbleBall with Ben Golliver
description:
Miles and Jack were pleased to be joined by the national NBA writer for The Washington Post, Ben Golliver on the latest episode of Boosties. The author of "BubbleBall" took them through what the experience of covering the NBA in the Bubble was like, whether the Lakers will be improved this year and plenty more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
